sqlMap.select: select ti.id as novelId, tn.title as title, ti.id as itemId, ti.subtitle as subtitle, a.`view`, date_format(ti.regDt,'%Y/%m/%d %h:%i') as regDate from tb_novel tn inner join tb_items ti on tn.id = ti.novelId left join ( select itemId as itemId, count(id) as `view` from tb_view group by itemId ) a on ti.id = a.itemId where tn.id = #novelId#
